tender.title: Construction of RCC Box Cell Bridge No. 1by1 size 4by4, 4 cell and Bridge No. 1by2 Size 3by3, 2 cell on Buri River and Mwjlai Beel at Surjyakhata to Gwthwibari village road under BTR for the year 2023-24. TN No.64_07
